Pulse mode can sometimes be more comfortable or effective for breaking up harder wax

Excessive ear wax build up can lead to ear discomfort and reduced hearing, which can affect your day-to-day life. Debrox helps remove earwax, which can contribute to tinnitus and other ear discomforts. After using Debrox, ear wax can drain from the ear and ears are relieved from built-up ear wax so you can return to daily life without muffled hearing caused by excess ear wax.
